title: Learning A-Z
item_1: Developed a student login system feature with QR codes using AngularJS, PHP and MySQL
item_2: Strengthened ability to write clean code by exchanging constructive code reviews with other interns

title: Lurie Nanofabrication Center

title: WAFR Becoming A Robot Guru 2018 Workshop
